Description.Name: Stringfellow Hawk
Description.Details: A Hellicopter Pilot, Stringfellow Hawk is the Testpilot for the 40 ton VTOL know as "AIRWOLF".  Few people can bring the piloting and engineering skills together to master an experimental VTOL of this type.  Sringfellow is known to associate with HM Murdock.  Outside of the VTOL test pilot roles, String is an avid collector of art and enjoys playing the Cello
